fr_FR.description: Un mod d'aide qui vous permet d'automatiser la conversion des textures PVRZ vers les différents types de compression utilisés par les variantes mobiles des jeux de l'Enhanced Edition.

components.1: PVRTC 2bpp: All game files, alpha-blended files only
components.3: PVRTC 2bpp: Override files only, alpha-blended files only
components.5: PVRTC 4bpp: All game files, alpha-blended files only (iOS recommended)
components.7: PVRTC 4bpp: Override files only, alpha-blended files only (iOS recommended)
components.9: ETC1: All game files, alpha-blended files only
components.11: ETC1: Override files only, alpha-blended files only
components.13: ETC2: All game files, alpha-blended files only
components.15: ETC2: Override files only, alpha-blended files only

en_US.description: A helper mod that lets you automate the conversion of PVRZ textures to the different compression types used by the mobile variants of Enhanced Edition games.

zh_CN.description: 这是一个辅助模组，可让您自动将PVRZ纹理转换为增强版游戏移动版本所使用的不同压缩类型。
